besides, any decent thief could destroy that scenario. all he has to do is 
stay invisible and spawn poison clouds. the A.I. isn't that smart.


----Original Message Follows----
--- In gladiator@y..., bluedrgnkid@a... wrote:
 > If you had a huge amount of mana and health, it would be almost
unstoppable!!! You could probably take down the shareware
mission(the one with the big island and incredible number of monsters)
with no problem.

That scenario (#0 in the registered version) is a joke compared to my
own scenarios.  I have an archer who can beat that scenario without
problems, but nearly gets clobbered in "The Brag".
